controller.entities

Class EntityBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.entities.EntityBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CursorBody, DrawnLineBody, InkJarBody, PortalBody, StickmanBody

    public abstract class EntityBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class that represents an abstract physical body supported by a Box2D body.

                               float forceY,

        Wraps the applyForceToCenter method from the Box2D body class.
        Parameters:
        forceX - the x-component of the force to be applied
        forceY - the y-component of the force to be applied
        awake - should the body be awaken
